title: Talking With Patients About Respiratory Virus Season
content:
Explain how to use the
other prevention tools
and how these tools can help them and their families stay safe this season. These tools include:
Testing
Well-fitted masks
Physical distancing
Washing hands
Improving airflow or ventilation where the patient lives and works
Resources to share
Vaccine or immunization information sheets
COVID-19 Vaccine
Inactivated Influenza Vaccine
Live Intranasal Influenza Vaccine
RSV Preventive Antibody Immunization
RSV Vaccine
Communication resources
